subject.normal: [Bug 187068] Name clash reported as an error in editor but not when building the project

headers.subject: [Bug 187068] Name clash reported as an error in editor but not when building the project
headers.received: by mail02.netbeans.org (Postfix, from userid 60005) id 154833AC09; Mon, 25 Oct 2010 14:42:36 +0000 (GMT)

body.para: --- Comment #4 from Dusan Balek <dbalek@netbeans.org> 2010-10-25 14:42:32 --- Your example is not compilable when using JDK 1.7 javac compiler (tested in shell on jdk1.7.0-b102). Since the NB editor uses 1.7 javac for its internal compilation, name clashes are reported.
If you really think that your source is correct and there is a bug in the JDK 1.7 javac compiler, please file the bug report against JDK 1.7 javac.
Closing as WONTFIX on the NetBetans side.
body.footer: -- Configure bugmail: http://netbeans.org/bugzilla/userprefs.cgi?tab=email ------- You are receiving this mail because: ------- You are the QA contact for the bug.
